name: Dungeon Castle
description:
You have been summoned to an unknown castle.
And you will receive one mission.
Gather various voice data and approach the truth.
And you have to delete the root node of the network metabus that is connected to all that truth.
In that "Dungeon Castle" where you are.

Adventure


"You have to get through the Dungeon Castle with a torch and a weapon"
Where you are hidden in the dark, light up your way with torches, and defeat enemies who threaten you with weapons and move forward.

Action & battle.


"The enemies you will meet are powerful"
If you are attacked, you will be in a very dangerous state.
Also, enemies can ignore your attack.
That's why always aim behind your enemies.
And try to avoid enemy attacks as much as possible.

Growth


"The torches, weapons, and abilities given to you can be stronger"
Various weapons, attributes, and new abilities are essential for you to get through the dungeon.

Another dungeon



"There are other dungeons in the Dungeon Castle"
You have to clear different dungeons to get a variety of voice data.
Don't hesitate to try.

Characteristics of games


- The fun of exploring and exploring dark castles.
- A strong sense of hitting and exhilarating combat action stand out.
- Nine weapons, 20 combat animations, and various abilities.
- Interesting main story and sub story.
